entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly load directory broken #115135
  • [API Proposal]: Sort() on OrderedDictionary #115127
  • Binding source generator emits bad code for tuples #115133
  • Polyfill IAsyncEnumerable from Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces does not work in net8.0 without reference to Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces #115124
  • Arm64: phiFound || ((ehDsc != nullptr) && !m_pCompiler->m_dfsTree->Contains(ehDsc->ebdTryBeg)) SSA: insert phis #115123
  • Arm64: !"Inconsistent profile data" Remove empty try-catch-fault 3 #115122
    10.0.0
  • Assert failure: CheckInstrBytePattern(base[offset] & 0xF8, 0x58, base[offset]) #115120
  • [WinHTTP] Validate header values for ASCII #115112
    10.0.0
  • Full GC notify not raised on Server GC #115110
  • JIT: Wrong result with do-while loops #115109
  • GC pause times grow exponentially when DOTNET_EnableEventLog=1 #115108
    10.0.0
  • [browser] remove rest of StartupMemoryCache #115107
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Accept HttpCompletionOptions to more places #115106

Closed

  • 在一个EXE应用程序中调用多个由.NET9 AOT发布的动态库so文件会引发异常 #114193
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add non-overflowing widening sum to Vector types #114832
  • Test failure: System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests.GetAscii_Success #115087
    10.0.0
  • [Proposal]: .NET DI council #35999
  • TryAddSingleton custom AuthorizationPolicyProvider #36014
  • Respect ServiceLifeTime during resolution #36050
  • DependencyInjection does not allow lazy/factory injection of an IDisposable which should not be disposed #36049
  • [AVX10.2]Optimize codegen for x86 using the new minmax instructions when possible. #109081
    10.0.0
  • We deserve a Substring() method that does not throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException #113383
  • Implement IRootFunctions for Complex #113569
  • [API Proposal]: Revisit Avx10v2.V512 decision #113757
    10.0.0
  • double.ToString(string) missing digit using scientific notation #113155
  • Custom Numeric Format String Rounds Erroneously #114104
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Csp.Tests failing on macOS x64 Debug #104172
    Future
  • [AVX10.2]Optimize codegen for x86 using the new saturating conversion instructions when possible. #109080
    10.0.0
  • HW Intrinsics: Add BSR, BSF, and BSWAP intrinsics #10741
    Future
  • BCL: Encountering System.NullReferenceException when 'enumerationOptions' parameter of Directory.EnumerateFiles method is null #114623
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Public API for the Runtime Async #114310
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 10/18/2024 8:32:15 PM - Churn from Block Layout Changes #109122
    10.0.0
  • `mcs.exe -dumpMap` failing to print all the methods #87086
    10.0.0
  • Failure in DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.TestRateLimitingSampler(maxOperationPerSecond) - Two events were recorded #114945
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 9/10/2024 6:39:57 AM #107925
    10.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.Functional.Tests crash on assert #112700
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ability to have stable hash codes #88031
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Provide API for freeing Variant memory #79402
    Future
  • Support using function pointers with `PersistedAssemblyBuilder` #115015
  • Proposal: return random double within a specific range (inclusive) #37905
  • Standard FixedArray types in BCL? #102462
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in ImmutableArray.ToBuilder #115104
  • Test failure: System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientSendMailTest_SendMailAsync.MultipleRecipients_Failure_All #115103

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert JIT_Box* to C# #115134
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Alma Linux 8 -> 9 #115132
    needs-area-label
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow xcast #115130
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove Raspbian 10 #115129
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update gcc leg from v14 to v15 #115128
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Minor tensor fixes #115125
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • JIT: use root compiler instance for sufficient PGO observation #115119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable SVE2 instruction set detection for ARM64 #115117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix missing coverage of F# resources in linker RemoveResourcesStep #115116
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115114
    area-codeflow
  • [browser] runtimeConfig via dotnet.boot.js #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use Span<T>-based methods in System.Net.Mail #115111
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • [mono][infra] Extend subscriber list for `area-Infrastructure-mono` #115118
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix the value of MethodImplOptions.Async in spec #115126
    area-Meta, community-contribution, runtime-async
  • win-x86: Replace "ret n" thunks with assembly code #115089
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement breakpoint disassembly support for Intel APX #114120
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, apx
  • Fix IDN Test on Linux #115121
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Add null check for EnumerationOptions #114672
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [clr-interp] Implement `CEE_LOCALLOC` and frame data allocator for dynamic stack allocations #114860
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Fix method table slot lookup #115057
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add single-file host tests for native library load #115061
    area-Single-File, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Consider WasmSDK projects RID agnostic #114429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove redundant 'freeList' field from HashLookup class #114914
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution
  • Simplify conditional operator #112074
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [NativeAOT] Add linux-arm64 pri1 runtime tests to outerloop run #114948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add PKCS#8, SPKI and PEM support for SLH-DSA #114943
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding additional 8 eGPR. #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Fix regex description emitted by generator for switched branches #115136
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Simplify 64-bit platform conditions #115083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: PKCS12/PFX Loading #115100
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: Fix-up ASN.1 reading and writing logic #115066
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    runtime-async
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2697699 #115007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add VMOVD VMOVW APIs in JIT #115068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Refactor around impDevirtualizeCall for GVM devirt #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] try disabling dwarf symbols in the aot output #114805
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use bitwise operations to get the absolute values of integers #113679
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [infra][Apple] Fix Apple mobile runtime test reporting #114862
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #114932
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Correct some comments in Avx*.cs #115056
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Fix R2R files doublemap on UNIX #113082
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build host.native for native AOT libraries testing #114764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce branches in padding adjustment in FromBase64_ComputeResultLength #115022
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use AssemblyLoadContext-aware caches in TypeDescriptor to support unloading of assemblies cached by TypeDescriptor #114619
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.x
  • Enable CoreCLR/tvOS build #111804
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • [wasm coreclr] Make clr.runtime+libs build on Windows #115058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Clean up Wasm.Build.Tests #114993
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
